history.narrative: Law 1-101, the “Home Delivery Food Tax Act,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 1-316, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on September 15, 1976 and October 12, 1976, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on November 8, 1976, it was assigned Act No. 1-169 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
